languages.text: "Совсем нет? Неосмотрительно. В таком месте всегда надо ходить при оружии. Хотя бы при такой малышке". {n}Нищий выуживает из лохмотьев пистолет и демонстрирует, почему-то направив ствол вам в лицо.{/n} "Ну, чего стоишь? Выворачивай карманы".

traits.locale_text: "Совсем нет? Неосмотрительно. В таком месте всегда надо ходить при оружии. Хотя бы при такой малышке". {n}Нищий выуживает из лохмотьев пистолет и демонстрирует, почему-то направив ствол вам в лицо.{/n} "Ну, чего стоишь? Выворачивай карманы".
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: "No weapon at all? That's not good. This here's a bad place to be walking around unarmed. Could've at least found yourself one of these." {n}He pulls a pistol out of his rags and flaunts it by pointing it at your face for some reason.{/n} "A bit slow, are we? Empty your pockets."
languages.original_text: "Совсем нет? Неосмотрительно. В таком месте всегда надо ходить при оружии. Хотя бы при такой малышке". {n}Нищий выуживает из лохмотьев пистолет и демонстрирует, почему-то направив ствол вам в лицо.{/n} "Ну, чего стоишь? Выворачивай карманы".

traits.locale_text: "No weapon at all? There's an oversight. This here is a bad place to be walking around unarmed. Could've at least find yourself one of these." {n}He pulls a pistol out of his rags and shows it off by pointing it at your face for some reason.{/n} "A bit slow, are we? Empty your pockets."

Could've at least found yourself one of these." {n}He pulls a pistol out of his rags and flaunts it by pointing it at your face for some reason.{/n} "A bit slow, are we? Empty your pockets."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: 「ひとつも武器を持っていないのか？そいつはマズい。ここは丸腰で歩き回るにはまずい場所だ。せめて、これくらいは自分で見つけられただろうに」{n} ボロ布からピストルを取り出し、なぜかあなたの顔に銃口を向ける。{/n} 「ちょいと遅かったな？ポケットの中身を出せ」
languages.original_text: "No weapon at all? That's not good. This here's a bad place to be walking around unarmed. Could've at least found yourself one of these." {n}He pulls a pistol out of his rags and flaunts it by pointing it at your face for some reason.{/n} "A bit slow, are we? Empty your pockets."

traits.locale_text: 「ひとつも武器を持っていないのか？そいつはマズい。ここは丸腰で歩き回るにはまずい場所だ。せめて、これくらいは自分で見つけられただろうに」{n} ボロ布からピストルを取り出し、なぜかあなたの顔に銃口を向ける。{/n} 「ちょいと遅かったな？ポケットの中身を出せ」
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: “你身上没有武器？这恐怕可不太好啊。这种地方不适合手无寸铁的人来，你至少应该想办法弄到一把武器才对。”{n}他从破衣服里掏出一把手枪，带着炫耀的意味指着你的脸。{/n}“这些话早该说了，你觉得呢？把你所有的东西都交出来。”
languages.original_text: "No weapon at all? That's not good. This here's a bad place to be walking around unarmed. Could've at least found yourself one of these." {n}He pulls a pistol out of his rags and flaunts it by pointing it at your face for some reason.{/n} "A bit slow, are we? Empty your pockets."

traits.locale_text: “你身上没有武器？这可实在是太大意了。这种地方不适合手无寸铁的人来，你至少应该想办法弄到一把武器才对。”{n}他从破衣服里掏出一把手枪，带着炫耀的意味指着你的脸。{/n}“这些话早该说了，你觉得呢？把你所有的东西都交出来。”
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: «¿No lleva armas? Muy mal. Este es mal lugar para ir desarmado. Al menos podría haberse buscado una de estas». {n}Saca una pistola de entre sus harapos y hace alarde de ella apuntándote en la cara.{/n} «¿Es idiota o algo? Vacíe sus bolsillos».
languages.original_text: "No weapon at all? That's not good. This here's a bad place to be walking around unarmed. Could've at least found yourself one of these." {n}He pulls a pistol out of his rags and flaunts it by pointing it at your face for some reason.{/n} "A bit slow, are we? Empty your pockets."

traits.locale_text: «¿No lleva armas? Qué descuido. Este es mal lugar para ir desarmado. Al menos podría haberse buscado una de estas». {n}Saca una pistola de entre sus harapos y hace alarde de ella apuntándote en la cara.{/n} «¿Es idiota o algo? Vacíe sus bolsillos».
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: "Gar keine Waffe? Das ist nicht gut. Man sollte hier besser nicht unbewaffnet herumlaufen. Ihr hättet Euch wenigstens so eine hier suchen können." {n}Er zieht eine Pistole aus seinen Lumpen und richtet sie auf dein Gesicht.{/n} "Nicht gerade helle im Kopf, was? Leert Eure Taschen."
languages.original_text: "No weapon at all? That's not good. This here's a bad place to be walking around unarmed. Could've at least found yourself one of these." {n}He pulls a pistol out of his rags and flaunts it by pointing it at your face for some reason.{/n} "A bit slow, are we? Empty your pockets."

traits.locale_text: "Gar keine Waffe? Ganz schön nachlässig. Hier ist es gefährlich, da sollte man lieber nicht unbewaffnet herumlaufen. Ihr hättet Euch wenigstens so eine hier suchen können." {n}Er zieht eine Pistole aus seinen Lumpen und gibt aus irgendeinem Grund damit an, indem er sie auf dein Gesicht richtet.{/n} "Nicht gerade helle im Kopf, was? Leert Eure Taschen."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: « Aucune arme du tout ? Ça craint. C'est pas le genre d'endroit où on peut se balader en sifflotant les mains dans les poches. Vous auriez au moins dû rapporter un truc comme ça, » {n}ajoute-t-il en extirpant un pistolet de ses guenilles et en le pointant directement sur votre visage, l'air de rien.{/n} « On est un peu lent à la détente, hein ? Allez, videz vos poches. »
languages.original_text: "No weapon at all? That's not good. This here's a bad place to be walking around unarmed. Could've at least found yourself one of these." {n}He pulls a pistol out of his rags and flaunts it by pointing it at your face for some reason.{/n} "A bit slow, are we? Empty your pockets."

traits.locale_text: « Aucune arme du tout ? C'est pas très malin. C'est pas le genre d'endroit où on peut se balader en sifflotant les mains dans les poches. Vous auriez au moins dû rapporter un truc comme ça, » {n}ajoute-t-il en extirpant un pistolet de ses guenilles et en le pointant directement sur votre visage, l'air de rien.{/n} « On est un peu lent d'esprit, hein ? Allez, videz vos poches. »
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: "Hiç mi silahın yok? Yapma ya. Burada silahsız gezilmez. En azından elinin altından şunlardan olacak." {n}Üstündeki paçavraların arasından bir tabanca çıkarıyor ve göstermek için suratına doğrultuyor.{/n} "Yavaş kaldın bak. Boşalt ceplerini."
languages.original_text: "No weapon at all? That's not good. This here's a bad place to be walking around unarmed. Could've at least found yourself one of these." {n}He pulls a pistol out of his rags and flaunts it by pointing it at your face for some reason.{/n} "A bit slow, are we? Empty your pockets."

traits.locale_text: "Hiç mi silahın yok? Fena olmuş. Burası silahsız gezmek için kötü bir yer. En azından bunlardan bir tane bulsaydın." {n}Üstündeki kumaşların arasından bir tabanca çıkarıyor ve göstermek için suratına doğrultuyor.{/n} "Biraz yavaşız ha? Ceplerini boşalt."
traits.speaker: TrampMain
